description.p: Takes an array of values and checks the rows with the specified values.
An array of values corresponding to the rows to check.

discussion.p: The *[js:setCheckedValues()]* method checks the rows matching the specified values specified as an array passed to the function. Any existing checked rows are left unmodified.
It is strongly recommended that you configure the List control to return a specific value, such as the Primary key field. This can be done by configuring the List's [Return value] settings.

page.important: This method is only available if [Has check-box select control] has been enabled.
page.limitations: List Control with 'Has check-box select control' Enabled
